values:
yea...

so about livejournal.

fuck it.

i've got other resources... this is all too much shit.
considering i barely speak to half of you...i'll be sad to go.
but alas, im off for good now

i sit here, rubbing my dry lips on top of one another.

i reach for the lipsmackers in front of me.  

i pull off the lid and inhale.

*watermelon* 

close eyes.

exhale - cue tears.

so...

after the past few nights of stalking everyone with my camera... 

i came to the conclusion that i needed to make an album, so i did - thanks milica!!!

http://photobucket.com/albums/b10/malpensada/

*****************************
           ***** A l l  I  W a n t  I s  Y o u  -  T h e r e  I s  N o  O n e  E l s e *****

                                                    T a k e  M e  A w a y
                                            **************************

I wake up for only you. 
I breathe for only you. 
I close my eyes to dream only of you. 
My mind races only with thoughts of you. 
My lips want only to be on your lips. 
My hand wants only to be in your hand. 
My breath wants only to be in your lungs. 
My eyes see only you. 
My soul only has love for you. 
You are everything to me. 
Take me away.
